actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to change the tariff classification of certain composition cork bound with pigmented binder.

summary.text: Defines, under the Tariff Schedules, the tariff classification of natural cork and composition cork, whether or not bound with pigmented binder.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to change the tariff classification of certain composition cork bound with pigmented binder.
